title: Amber Rose and Val Chmerkovskiy had the most adorable Kiss Cam moment

text:
Amber Rose and Val Chmerkovskiy had the most adorable Kiss Cam moment Jaleesa M. Jones , USA TODAY Published 10:56 a.m. ET Jan. 17, 2017 | Updated 13 hours ago 487 Shares A video posted by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Jan 16, 2017 at 3:07pm PST 
Gotcha! 
Amber Rose and her boyfriend, Val Chmerkovskiy, were caught on the Kiss Cam during their first high-profile appearance as a couple at the New York Knicks game at Madison Square Garden Monday. Rose took to Instagram to post the viral clip, in which the Dancing with the Stars alumni are seen seemingly shying away from a public display of affection before Chmerkovskiy leans in for a quick cheek kiss. 
"Why is he so cute tho," Rose wrote of the precious moment. 
The couple first became acquainted on the set of ABC’s Dancing when Rose was partnered with Chmerkovskiy's older brother, Dancing champion, Maksim, who later went on to win the mirrored ball with Laurie Hernandez . 
The pair fueled rumors last month when they were photographed stepping out together hand-in-hand. Rose then stoked the flames by referring to Chmerkovskiy as her " bae " on social media before confirming the relationship on the first 2017 episode of her Loveline with Amber Rose podcast, which she co-hosts with sex therapist Dr. Chris Donaghue. 
"It's so good," Rose said of their relationship. "It's been four months now and it's awesome. You know, I love his family and everyone's just so great and he's great." 
"You know, I just feel like it’s so hard being famous and dating — not so much for the people but (with) the fans and, like, the people outside looking in," she continued. "It’s, like, you date someone so you have to be with them for years or forever and you have to get married. And it’s just like, you know, you date people to get to know them and you either like them after six months or you don’t and you kind of just figure it out along the way. And right now, it’s just absolutely amazing and I’m super, super happy." 
Sounds like someone might have just danced away with Rose's heart. Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Happy Muva’s Day! Amber Rose, affectionately known as “Muva” to her fans, celebrates her 33rd birthday Friday. In honor of the occasion, we look back on the model and TV personality’s head-turning appearances. Here she is at the 16th Annual Elle Women in Hollywood Tribute at the Four Seasons Hotel on Oct. 19, 2009 in Beverly Hills, Calif. Rose was a Master of the Mix judge at the event. Michael Stewart, Getty Images for Smirnoff With then-partner Wiz Khalifa at the 54th Grammy Awards in Los Angeles on Feb. 12, 2012. Joe Klamar, AFP/Getty Images At the 55th annual Grammy Awards in February 2013, Rose was pregnant with their son, Sebastian. She gave birth weeks after the show. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY Rose, seen solo on the carpet at the 2014 Grammys, filed for divorce from Wiz Khalifa later that year.
